body_html:
I had experienced the same issue. What exactly worked for me that I just closed all opened terminals and opened again, then it worked! . Because I was working on multiple virtual environments at the same time and most probably this caused GPU's memory overloaded.
Hope works for all having this issue.

body:
I had experienced the same issue. What exactly worked for me that I just closed all opened terminals and opened again, then it worked! . Because I was working on multiple virtual environments at the same time and most probably this caused GPU's memory overloaded. 
Hope works for all having this issue.
